book.synopsis: Tan Hadron from the realm of Gathol encounters a wide range of enemies in this science fiction thriller of the 1930"s. He fends off green men, mad scientists, cannibals, spiders and white apes. The main character, Tan Hadron, finds himself an unlikely hero in this pulp fiction classic.
book.title_long: A Fighting Man of Mars: (#7) (Martian Tales of Edgar Rice Burroughs, No 7)
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 1.6 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
